title: Fart.Army
description: I want you to join the army.

home.title: Fart step, MARCH
home.description: On April 30, 2020, a brown mercenary was shopping for domain names with unusual extensions and thinking about farts at the same time. Fart.Army was only $15 a year. With that sweet stimulus money burning a hole in his pocket, a movement of flatulent action was born.
